doc:
Dwight Hauser https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dwight_Hauser 0 Dwight Arthur Hauser (July 4, 1911 – January 18, 1969) was an American film screenwriter, actor and film producer, also the father of actor Wings Hauser and actor Erich Hauser. Dwight_Arthur_Hauser ( July_4_,_1911 – January_18_,_1969 ) was an_American_film_screenwriter , actor_and_film_producer , also the_father of actor_Wings_Hauser and actor_Erich_Hauser .
